segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn't even notice the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is getting bigger and bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in the middle of it, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children behind her, quietly trying to get some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar on the top shelf.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks really unstable, like it's going to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, looking up at the boy with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really turn off the faucet and pay attention to the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window looks so calm and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the water before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
